features: 💍-[Travel Accessories]:Travel essentials for women.Travel size toiletries.Travel gifts for women.

💍-[Travel Essentials]:How to use--Remove the sprayer from your favorite perfume bottle. Place the base of the atomizer on the perfume nozzle. Press down firmly to pump your perfume into the atomizer. Seal and carry your portable fragrance companion with confidence.

🏕️-[Travel Size ]:3 x 0.6 inches and the refillable perfume bottle volume of is 5 ml. There are more than 70 sprays;The travel perfume bottle is lightweight and durable, you could put refillable perfume bottle on your purse or pocket without weight.

💯-[Womens Gifts for Valentines]:Take these refillable perfume bottle with you to a party, on vacation, leave one in your car, out to dinner with friends, the gym or anywhere else you need to look and smell your best.

💎-[Travel Perfume Bottle Refillable]:Stocking stuffers for women.The perfume bottle is made of high-quality aluminum, you don't have to worry about damaging the durability when you drop it on the ground.

🏖️-[Perfume Atomizer Travel Accessories]:The perfume atomizer bottle shell of the atomizer is made of great aluminum, and the refillable perfume bottle internal glass is sturdy and durable. You don't have to worry about damaging the durability when you drop it on the ground.NO LEAKING!!

How to refill your perfume atomizer bottles? 1. Unplug the small lid of the perfume nozzle. 2. Point the bottle of the sub-bottling to the nozzle of the perfume. 3. Press up and down to the bottle. Please don't fill this bottle fully. 4. Diameter of the nozzle: < 4 mm Nozzle length: >8 mm

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Doesn't leak, but also doesn't fit the bottles I have
reviews.reviewText: The hole in the bottom doesn't fit my bottle of baccarat rouge 540 or Tom Ford's fing fabulous so I did what any sane person would do and had my husband rip out the top pump part. I filled it up just by pouring some into the reservoir and snapped the pump back into place. I figured it would leak after all that so I tested it and left them on their sides for a long while and rolled them all over my desk. Neither of them leaked. I'm wondering if the issues with leaking is because they filled it high enough for liquid to get in the straw connected to the bottom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use and reuse!
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use and reuse! Youuu can look up instructions anywhere and use pretty much any bottle! It's small size makes it convenient to put in your travel bag

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars perfect stocking stuffers
reviews.reviewText: I love this little travel bottles. I have a couple for myself and they are super easy to fill up and they do not leak when you pack them in your suitcase. I also love to get them for stocking stuffers since you get five in one pack. Great price and product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for traveling
reviews.reviewText: I love this product it was great for my trip abroad. However, one of them leaked out. Not meant to use with the larger perfume bottles. The nozzles are too big and that’s what caused the leaking.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I hate it and my eye hurts from the spray getting in. I don’t know if I want to cry for wasting my money or my eye. A previous customer said they was no directions. I’m thinking why would I need that. I can’t believe I needed them directions and they was nothing. 😫 It don’t even fill up. I sent all that time pumping my expensive perfume in the tube for it to just waste on me and not the little bottle. Im just mad and upset.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great, easy and small way to carry your favorite scent with you. Does not leak.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works Super Fast!
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use! Wish they provided instructions for those who may night know exactly how to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good for the price
reviews.reviewText: This is easy to use. The only complaint I have is that it leaks perfume out of the bottom where you fill it. I store it upside down so it doesn't leak too much.

reviews.reviewTitle: no leaking and price is reasonable for the package
reviews.reviewText: i didn't notice any leakage and price is reasonable for the package number. every scent in one porch :)
